generic

Class Rounder

  • java.lang.Object
    • generic.Rounder

  • public class Rounder
extends java.lang.Object
    class performing rounding to a specified accuracy. Numbers input will always be converted to double type

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rounder

        public Rounder(int precision)
        Parameters:
        precision - number of decimals relevant for rounding

    • Method Detail

      • getEpsilon

        public double getEpsilon()
        Returns:
        the epsilon value used for comparisons, thus 10^-(precision + 1)

      • getShift

        public double getShift()
        Returns:
        coefficient used to multiply when rounding and divide by after rounding, thus 10^precision

      • roundDigits

        public double roundDigits(java.lang.Number num)
        Parameters:
        num - number to round
        Returns:
        num rounded to specified decimal places

      • roundSignificant

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        num rounded to specified significant figures

      • getPrecision

        public int getPrecision()
        Returns:

      • epsilonEquals

        public boolean epsilonEquals(java.lang.Number n1,
                    java.lang.Number n2)
        Parameters:
        n1 - a number
        n2 - another number
        Returns:
        true if n1 ~= n2 for the specified precision/number of digits

      • significanceEquals

        public boolean significanceEquals(java.lang.Number n1,
                         java.lang.Number n2)
        Parameters:
        n1 - a number
        n2 - another number
        Returns:
        true if n1, n2 rounded to specified significant figures are equal
